languages.text: Wielder gains 2 MP and stacking +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% Critical Hit Chance until the end of round for each Melee AoE attack performed this round.

traits.locale_text: Wielder gains 2 MP and stacking +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% Critical Hit Chance until the end of round for each Melee AoE attack performed this round.

languages.text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, персонаж восстанавливает 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}. Суммируется и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer makes a melee area attack, they regain +2 MP and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% critical hit chance. Stacks and lasts until the end of round.

Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yaptığında +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} geri kazanır ve +%{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} elde eder. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yaptığında +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} geri kazanır ve +%{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} elde eder. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Giyen kişi, yakın dövüş {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yaptığında +2 HP geri kazanır ve +%{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} olasılığı elde eder. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realice un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}de área{/g}, recupera +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y gana un +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realice un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de área, recupera +2 PM y gana un +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} % de probabilidad de impacto crítico. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del asalto.

languages.text: 每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击时{/g}，都会恢复2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}%。此效果可叠加，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者进行近战范围攻击时，都会恢复2点移动点数，暴击率提高{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}%。此效果可叠加，持续至本轮结束。

languages.text: Führt der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} aus, erhält er +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und eine {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} von +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} %. Hält bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Führt der Träger einen Nahkampf-Flächenangriff aus, erhält er +2 BP und eine Kritische Trefferchance von +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} %. Hält bis zum Ende der Runde an. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, il récupère +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et gagne +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} % aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur exécute une attaque de zone en mêlée, il récupère +2 PD et gagne +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db} % aux chances de coup critique. Dure jusqu'à la fin du round. Cumulable.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行う際、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+2回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}%上昇する。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が近接範囲攻撃を行う際、MPを+2回復し、クリティカルヒット率が+{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}%上昇する。ラウンド終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
使用者が近接範囲攻撃を行う際、MPを+2回復し、クリティカルヒット率が+{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}%上昇する。ラウンド終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

traits.locale_text: Совершив атаку по области в ближнем бою, персонаж восстанавливает 2 ОП и получает +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% к шансу критического попадания. Суммируется и длится до конца раунда.

Совершив атаку по области в ближнем бою, персонаж восстанавливает 2 ОП и получает +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% к шансу критического попадания. Суммируется и длится до конца раунда.
